General.Name: Hotel Holiday Garden
General.Description: Hotel Holiday Garden operates hotels. The company operates Holiday Garden Hotel, an international tourist hotel with 270 guest rooms, lobby, banquet hall, swimming pool, gym, and other facilities; and Holiday Garden Hotel Kaohsiung Taroko Park in Kaohsiung. It also operates 4 hotels in the Northern and Southern California. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
